name: Aughild's Search
flavorText: Aughild had fifty demands that had to be met before he would spare the lives of the nobles. Those demands are written in the wrappings of these bracers.
flavorTextHtml: Aughild had fifty demands that had to be met before he would spare the lives of the nobles. Those demands are written in the wrappings of these bracers.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Reduces damage taken by 15%.    
 Increases damage dealt by 30%.(3) Set:     
 Reduces damage from elites by 30.0%    
 Increases damage against elites by 30.0%
